fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 1Y
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR TermLabel = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR MarketSubtype = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype]
VAR Days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    (
        TermLabel = "12 Month" ||
        TermLabel = "12 Month Swap" ||
        TermLabel = "1 Yr" ||
        TermLabel = "1 Yr Swap" ||
        TermLabel = "10 Month" ||
        TermLabel = "11 Month" ||
        TermLabel = "10 Month Swap" ||
        TermLabel = "11 Month Swap"
    )
    || (MarketSubtype = "Major Curve" && Days > 274 && Days <= 365)
    || (MarketSubtype = "6m Basis" && Days > 274 && Days <= 365 && CONTAINSSTRING(TermLabel, "FRA")),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to a DAX calculated column. Replaced Tableau CONTAINS(...) with DAX CONTAINSSTRING, mapped logical operators to DAX (||, &&), and transformed all field references to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. The result returns the sum of Delta Down T USD and Fix Value T when any of the TERM_LABEL conditions or Market Subtype/Days conditions are met, otherwise 0.
